pageTitle: Deputy Prime Minister’s itinerary for Monday, January 13, 2020 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

St. John’s, Newfoundland and Labrador

4:15 p.m.  The Deputy Prime Minister will meet with the Council of Atlantic Premiers.

Emera Innovation Exchange
100 Signal Hill Road

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting.
  • Media should arrive no later than 4:00 p.m.
